summary: Passionate about translating people's unique stories and vision into their brand; from managing strategies and campaigns for businesses wanting to authentically communicate their value proposition, to coaching entrepreneurs through building their personal brand.

treasury_media.title: Tell Your Unique Story Through Your Personal Style
treasury_media.description:
Are you excited to go from Style Starter to Style Storyteller?

Through Style Coaching, I am inviting you to take advantage of all my knowledge and abilities, as not only an Image Consultant but a Style Coach, to truly transform your life by working together.

If you're curious to learn more about this process, please see:  
https://payhip.com/b/Bx8R

projects.title: International Students Scientific Communication  - SECAAB 2010, 2011
projects.description:
Member of PR department, responsibilities:

• Created English advertisement for the International Conference of Business Communication for Students 
• Contacted university students groups in Romania and abroad to verify attendance and offer all necessary information about project requirements
• Managed relationship with local press and television members for event coverage

projects.title: Romanian-Dutch Business Carousel 2011
projects.description:
• Participated in meetings  with 4 business people from Romania discussing business environment and problems within a multinational company.
 • Worked towards gaining a better understanding of a multicultural business concept 
 • Implemented project regarding issues arising in multicultural businesses, collaborated with Dutch students

profile_positions.description:
•	Driving online branding initiatives with the goal of increasing brand awareness in the L&D space
•	Generating brand guidelines, coordinating brand asset production, overseeing the application of new branding elements internally and externally
•	End-to-end management of digital and offline client events, aligning lead generation strategy with brand direction
•	Liaising with Commercial and Product & Innovation teams to optimize customer brand experience in pre-, during, and post-acquisition phases
profile_positions.title: Digital Brand Specialist

profile_positions.description:
•	Offer personal branding services for women leaders, founders, creators, women in business and entrepreneurs: professional image consultation, brand guidelines, Social Media & communications strategy, personal confidence coaching
•	Manage clients and prospective clients Digital community;
•	Create copy, photo and video course materials for clients
•	Create content for webinars for business-driven women's groups and online platforms.
profile_positions.title: Style & Personal Branding Coach

profile_positions.description:
•	Created and managed a social media strategy that built meaningful connections and encouraged social media audience response.
•	Generated, edited, published and shared content (text, images, videos, and links) via Carhartt Europe social media channels in alignment with social strategy and with the seasonal campaigns.
•	Engaged with customers via social media platforms on a daily basis.
•	Selected and closely worked with relevant brand ambassadors for the social/online medium, in accordance with the Carhartt brand vision and representation.
•	Managed the implementation of relevant social UGC tools for optimal community engagement.
•	Partnered with the Digital Marketing Manager to develop content in every form that spoke to our customers, shaping a consistent image while meeting brand strategies and expectations.
•	Supported the Digital Marketing Manager by providing content and best practices implementation for e-mail communication success.
•	Worked closely with the Digital Manager for social advertising and video advertising campaigns copy creation, and ensured social agencies’ activity follow-up.
•	Managed and wrote community stories for Carhartt.com, maximizing the brand’s ability to lean into timely opportunities, and driving community conversation and interaction.
•	Captured and analyzed appropriate social data/metrics, insights and share best practices; made recommendations to the Digital Marketing Manager and the Ecommerce (D2C) Manager.
•	Identified trends, best practices and new developments within the social media sphere.
profile_positions.title: Community & Storytelling Specialist

profile_positions.description:
•	Defined, analyzed and adapted the brand’s Social media strategy together with Digital Marketing Manager, with a high focus on increasing brand awareness
•	Scheduled and posted messages on all digital community platforms (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Youtube, Twitter) according to strategy
•	Optimized brand presentation through storytelling on Carhartt Europe Social channels 
•	Developed the appropriate KPI’s to measure the success of various Social engagement driven efforts
•	Constantly explored emerging possibilities in the digital landscape, to support both our branding and commercial goals
•	As a direct result, managed the process of implementing Flowbox on Carhartt website, newsletters, Social ads to leverage UGC in our story telling and e-commerce activities
•	Managed the B2C e-mail calendar and newsletter execution, analyzing results and adapting content and strategy according to them
•	Worked closely with e-commerce Manager and e-commerce Merchandiser to ensure that the best products were being optimally represented in website campaigns and Social communications 
•	Supported Digital Marketing Manager with Social ads content; led Social ads content and KPI’s during her maternity leave
•	Developed and implemented a Social media influencer program together with the Digital Marketing Manager 
•	Collaborated with Web Content Specialist to implement Community and Stories on Carhartt EMEA/PAC website, creating a tighter network of ambassadors and friends of Carhartt in Europe
•	Worked with US counterparts in optimizing traffic on Social channels, aligning strategies and PR opportunities
•	Closely collaborated with our Customer Service team, to quickly and accurately answer consumer product and brand questions through Social media channels.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Specialist

profile_positions.description:
•	Created brand presentation website in accordance to our brand identity and market positioning (https://www.internationalbg.com/)
•	Produced seasonal brand catalogues and workbooks for distributors and tradeshows
•	Managed Magnum Boots website communication through B2C friendly product descriptions, product photography and writing monthly blog entries
•	Managed B2B e-mail campaigns with distributors (calendar and execution), ensuring a strong and coherent brand positioning 
•	Supported distributors by creating personalized Marketing materials, branded advertisements, visual artwork, to enhance our brand presence internationally
•	Supported distributors' social media channel management, to ensure adherence to brand guidelines
•	Responsible for liaising with Product Managers to create B2C friendly product copy, supporting sales
•	Supported Global Marketing Manager with implementing company re-branding across markets and ensuring all circulated marketing materials meet brand standards
•	Managed e-commerce photography process in accordance to brand guidelines
•	In collaboration with Brand Director and Global Marketing Manager, coordinated tradeshows and events from concept to on-site presence
profile_positions.title: Marketing & Product Executive

profile_positions.description:

•	Coordinated Sales Assistants in daily activities to ensure fast-paced store maintenance and consistent customer service
•	Maintained level of existing marketing signage throughout store at corporate level
•	Processed employees travel expenses and worked hours/scheduling database
